question: What is India's rank is 2018 Global Real Estate Transparency Index (GRETI)?
explanation: India has moved up one place from 36 in 2016 to 35th spot in 2018 on JLL\'s Global Real Estate Transparency Index (GRETI) aided by improvement in market fundamentals, policy reforms, and liberalization of FDI. The report covers 100 markets and is based on 186 indicators divided into six areas â€“performance measurement, market fundamentals, governance of listed vehicles, regulatory & legal frameworks, transaction process and environmental sustainability.
